definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion
to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops

sentences.english: Article 24 No temporary textile export license may be counterfeited or altered.
sentences.chinese: 第二十四條紡織品臨時出口許可證不得僞造和變造。
